title: Second Honeymoon on Dune Road
description: Second Honeymoon on Dune Road follows the journey of four newlywed couples who are thrust into impromptu vacation plans. The couples become instant friends, and we are privy to the trials and tribulations they undertake in their first decade of marriage. The cohesiveness of these eight people brings them to celebrate love and life at the place where it all began.
author: Phil Wohl
